#define ZB_CHANNEL_26   0x04000000uL
#define ZB_CHANNEL_25   0x02000000uL
#define ZB_CHANNEL_24   0x01000000uL
#define ZB_CHANNEL_23   0x00800000uL
#define ZB_CHANNEL_22   0x00400000uL
#define ZB_CHANNEL_21   0x00200000uL
#define ZB_CHANNEL_20   0x00100000uL
#define ZB_CHANNEL_19   0x00080000uL
#define ZB_CHANNEL_18   0x00040000uL
#define ZB_CHANNEL_17   0x00020000uL
#define ZB_CHANNEL_16   0x00010000uL
#define ZB_CHANNEL_15   0x00008000uL

#define ZB_CHANNEL_13   0x00002000uL
#define ZB_CHANNEL_12   0x00001000uL
#define ZB_CHANNEL_11   0x00000800uL
#define LOWEST_ZIGBEE_CHANNEL   11u
#define HIGHEST_ZIGBEE_CHANNEL   26u
#define BEACON_AMOUNT   3u
#define LOWEST_ZIGBEE_CHANNEL_MASK   0x00000800uL
#define VALID_ZIGBEE_CHANNEL_MASK   0x07FFF800uL
#define ZLL_PRIMARY_CHANNELMASK   (ZB_CHANNEL_11 | ZB_CHANNEL_15 | ZB_CHANNEL_20 | ZB_CHANNEL_25)
#define ZLL_SECONDARY_CHANNELMASK   (VALID_ZIGBEE_CHANNEL_MASK & (~ZLL_PRIMARY_CHANNELMASK))

Typedef Documentation

typedef enum N_DeviceInfo_Profile_t N_DeviceInfo_Profile_t

The supported profiles. Can be cast to uint16_t to get the profile IDs.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum N_DeviceInfo_Profile_t

The supported profiles. Can be cast to uint16_t to get the profile IDs.

Function Documentation

void N_DeviceInfo_Subscribe ( const N_DeviceInfo_Callback_t *  pCallback)

Subscribe to this component's callbacks.

Parameters:
pCallbackPointer to a callback structure filled with functions to be called.
const char* N_DeviceInfo_GetStackVersion ( void  )

Return the version string for the ZigBee Platform.

Returns:
Pointer to the version string

To get a correct version string a pre-build action must be run to generate N_DeviceInfo_Version.h. This file must a define for N_DEVICE_INFO_PLATFORM_VERSION. The version string has the following format.

(ZigBee Platform release),package_ZigBee (svnversion of package_ZigBee folder),package_Z_Stack (svnversion of package_ZigBee folder),built by (name of user of build machine)

For the output format of svnversion run svnversion help on the command line.

uint8_t N_DeviceInfo_GetChannelForIndex ( uint8_t  index,
uint32_t  channelMask 
)

Retrieve one of the channels from a channel mask.

Parameters:
indexAn index from 0 to N_DeviceInfo_GetNrChannelsInChannelMask()-1
channelMaskThe channelmask
Returns:
The channels from the given channel mask in order, e.g. index 0 will return the lowest channel.
bool N_DeviceInfo_IsChannelInMask ( uint8_t  channel,
uint32_t  channelMask 
)

Returns whether a channel is valid according to the current channel mask.

Parameters:
channelThe channel to check
channelMaskThe channelMask to check
Returns:
TRUE if the channel is in the mask, otherwise FALSE

bool N_DeviceInfo_IsEndDevice_Impl ( void  ) [private]

Implementation of N_DeviceInfo_IsEndDevice

This function is inline to make it possible for the compiler to remove router/enddevice only code.
